alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 11:31AM CST until November 29 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CST FOR EASTERN CHICKASAW...SOUTHEASTERN PONTOTOC AND WEST CENTRAL MONROE COUNTIES... At 1131 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Okolona, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aberdeen, Houston, Okolona, Trebloc, McCondy, Van Vleet, Parkersburg, Egypt, Buena Vista and Leotis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
